html:
Post-hardcore legends Balance and Composure just released a live performance of their entire The Things We Think We're Missing record this Friday.

Performed at Studio 4, Andy Slaymaker (rhythm guitar), Erik Peterson (lead guitar), Jon Simmons (lead vocals, rhythm guitar), Matt Warner (bass) and Dennis Wilson (drums) revisit the record that now sits at over 52 million streams to date in a live-setting that near mimics the record's studio quality.

The instrumentals are so crisp and clear – with the sound engineer mixing like the rent is due – that Balance and Composure's newest performance allows nothing to be missed.
